title: daNDAyudan divya
sahitya:
daNDAyudan divya darishanam kaNDOrkkellAm uNDAgum paravasham


anupallavi

  ren pazhani tannil punnakai polivinAl anbar anaivarkkum Anandam aLIkkum


caraNam    parppala vEDam pUNDu pArttOrai Irttu arputak-kATSi tanai aLittuk-kaLippOn
porppadam tanadinaip-pOTrip-paNivOrkku karpakat-taruvena narp-phalanITriDum
